Html:
I want the reference style as written below
Ahmad, N., M. Asgher, M. Shafique, and A. Qureshi. 2007. An evidence of high prevalence of hepatitis c virus in faisalabad, pakistan. Saudi medical journal. 28: 390-395. with citation Ahmad et al. (2007). How can I develop this style in MS word 2013. I have make XSL file but word does not read my style. Can any body help me to solve this problem.

If your style does not show up in the dropdown, then it is most likely because your xslt is not a well formed XML document. Probably you forgot to close a tag somewhere. If you have access to an xml editor, it might be usefull to check the file in there to see if it is well formed.
